content:
EVALUATION TASK: Build a documentation portal with these features:

1. Homepage with hero section and feature cards
2. Docs pages with sidebar navigation
3. Search with Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut
4. Theme toggle (dark/light mode)
5. API reference section

DEPLOY THE FULL GAS TOWN HIERARCHY:
- Mayor (you): Coordinate everything, be LIBERAL with agent spawning
- Explorer: Scout the codebase first
- Witnesses: Monitor frontend and styling work
- Specialists: Implement features (one per feature)
- Reviewer: Code quality gate
- Refinery: Process merge queue
- Deacon: Agent patrol

IMPORTANT PRINCIPLES (from Agent Abstraction Tiers):
1. You (Mayor) should spawn persistent agents LIBERALLY via the API - use the full role hierarchy
2. Non-spawning roles (specialists, reviewers, refinery) should use native Task tool subagents HEAVILY for exploration, research, and verification to prevent context rot
3. Every agent should be delegating constantly - work flows down, only results and blockers flow up
4. This evaluates the new delegation patterns

Create beads for each feature. Assign them to specialists. Begin immediately - do not wait for confirmation.

RECON COMPLETE: eval-docportal codebase analysis

## Tech Stack
- **React** 19.2.0 (latest)
- **Vite** 7.2.4 (build/dev server)
- **TypeScript** ~5.9.3
- **Tailwind CSS** 4.1.18 + @tailwindcss/typography
- **PostCSS** + Autoprefixer
- **ESLint** 9.x with react-hooks & react-refresh plugins

## Project Structure
```
eval-docportal/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ App.tsx (main component - default Vite counter)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ main.tsx (React entry with StrictMode)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.css (global styles)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ App.css (component styles)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ assets/react.svg
â”œâ”€â”€ public/vite.svg
â”œâ”€â”€ index.html (entry point)
â”œâ”€â”€ vite.config.ts
â”œâ”€â”€ tsconfig.json (project refs)
â”œâ”€â”€ tsconfig.app.json
â”œâ”€â”€ tsconfig.node.json
â”œâ”€â”€ eslint.config.js
â””â”€â”€ package.json
```

## Current State
- Fresh Vite + React + TypeScript scaffold
- Default template with counter example
- NO routing, NO state management (beyond useState), NO custom components
- Tailwind installed but not yet configured/used in components
- ES Modules enabled (type: module)

## Key Patterns
- Standard Vite entry: index.html -> main.tsx -> App.tsx
- TypeScript project references for app vs node configs
- React StrictMode enabled
- CSS with light/dark mode support via prefers-color-scheme

## Ready for Development
The scaffold is minimal and ready for building the docportal. Tailwind is available but not integrated into components yet.
Refinery online. Merge queue is empty. Standing by to process MRs as they arrive. Will check review gate (reviewStatus=approved, buildStatus=passed) before merging.

NUDGE: You should claim BEAD-001 (Homepage with hero section and feature cards). Use: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:3001/api/beads/BEAD-001 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{ "status": "in_progress", "assignee": "homepage-dev" }'. Log progress via API.

NUDGE: You should claim BEAD-002 (Docs pages with sidebar navigation). Use: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:3001/api/beads/BEAD-002 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{ "status": "in_progress", "assignee": "docs-dev" }'. Log progress via API.

NUDGE: You should claim BEAD-003 (Search with Ctrl+K shortcut). Use: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:3001/api/beads/BEAD-003 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{ "status": "in_progress", "assignee": "search-dev" }'. Log progress via API.

NUDGE: You should claim BEAD-005 (API reference section). Use: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:3001/api/beads/BEAD-005 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{ "status": "in_progress", "assignee": "api-ref-dev" }'. Log progress via API.

NUDGE: Please log your progress via the API. You have claimed BEAD-003 (Search with Ctrl+K shortcut) but I see no progress updates yet. Use: curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/progress with your status, completed items, and next steps.
REMINDER: Claim BEAD-004 (Theme toggle) if you have not already. Keep logging progress via API.
STATUS CHECK: Deacon here. Please log progress via the API. Are you monitoring frontend work? Report status.
STATUS CHECK: Deacon here. Please log progress via the API. Are you monitoring styling work? Report status.

BEGIN WORK on BEAD-001. Build homepage with hero section and feature cards. First explore codebase via Task subagent to understand structure, then implement. Submit to merge queue when done, message reviewer for review.
BEGIN WORK on BEAD-002. Build docs pages with sidebar navigation. First explore codebase via Task subagent, then implement collapsible sidebar. Submit to merge queue when done, message reviewer.
BEGIN WORK on BEAD-003. Implement search with Ctrl+K shortcut. Build search modal that opens on Ctrl+K, with filtering across docs. Submit to merge queue when done, message reviewer.
BEGIN WORK on BEAD-004. Implement theme toggle dark/light mode. Add toggle component, theme context, CSS variables, persist preference. Submit to merge queue when done, message reviewer.
BEGIN WORK on BEAD-005. Build API reference section. Create endpoint listings with method, path, params, response examples. Submit to merge queue when done, message reviewer.

Task complete: BEAD-004 Theme toggle implemented.

Files created:
- src/context/ThemeContext.tsx - Provider with persistence
- src/context/ThemeContextValue.ts - Context type definitions
- src/hooks/useTheme.ts - Hook for theme access
- src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx - Toggle button component
- src/components/ThemeToggle.css - Toggle styles

Files modified:
- src/App.tsx - Added ThemeToggle
- src/main.tsx - Wrapped app with ThemeProvider
- src/index.css - CSS variables for theming

Build and lint pass. Submitted to merge queue as MR-001.
MONITOR homepage-dev, docs-dev, search-dev. Check their progress every few minutes. Nudge if stuck, escalate blockers to me.
MONITOR theme-dev, api-ref-dev. Check their progress every few minutes. Nudge if stuck, escalate blockers to me.

Your merge request "Add API reference section with endpoint listings" has file conflicts with: Add theme toggle with dark/light mode and persistence (theme-dev). Please coordinate with the other agents or wait for their MRs to merge first.

Your merge request "Add documentation pages with collapsible sidebar navigation" has file conflicts with: Add theme toggle with dark/light mode and persistence (theme-dev). Please coordinate with the other agents or wait for their MRs to merge first.

Task complete: API reference section built (BEAD-005).

Deliverables:
- src/data/api/endpoints.ts - Typed endpoint definitions (10 endpoints covering Users, Documents, Authentication)
- src/components/Endpoint/* - Reusable components (MethodBadge, EndpointCard, EndpointDetail)
- src/pages/ApiReference.tsx - Main page with collapsible sidebar navigation

Build passed successfully. Submitted MR-002 to merge queue (note: has conflict with MR-001 on src/App.tsx - may need coordination).

BEAD-002 complete: Documentation pages with collapsible sidebar navigation. Created: src/components/Sidebar.tsx (collapsible nav), src/components/DocNav.tsx (on-page TOC), src/pages/DocsPage.tsx (main docs layout). Build passes. Submitted MR-003 to merge queue. Note: Conflict detected with MR-001 on shared files (App.tsx, App.css, index.css). Ready for review.
STATUS CHECK: Mayor, you have unread messages from scout and refinery. Your lastSeen is 6+ minutes old. Please respond and log progress. Deacon monitoring agent health.

Your merge request "Add homepage with hero section and feature cards" has file conflicts with: Add theme toggle with dark/light mode and persistence (theme-dev). Please coordinate with the other agents or wait for their MRs to merge first.
REMINDER: I see you created Hero.tsx and FeatureCard.tsx - great progress! Please log your progress via the API so we can track your work.

URGENT: MR-001 from theme-dev needs review. 3 other MRs (MR-002, MR-003, MR-004) are blocked with conflicts waiting for MR-001 to merge. Please review and approve MR-001 so the merge pipeline can proceed.
ALERT: MR-001 is in_queue and needs build verification. Once reviewer approves, please run build checks. 3 MRs are blocked on MR-001.

Homepage implementation complete (MR-004). Created Hero component with gradient background and CTA buttons, FeatureCard component with icons, and Home page with 6 feature cards. Build and lint pass. Note: conflicts with MR-001 (theme-dev) on App.tsx, App.css, index.css - will need conflict resolution during merge.

Task complete: Homepage with hero section and feature cards. Files: src/components/Hero.tsx, src/components/FeatureCard.tsx, src/pages/Home.tsx, src/App.tsx, src/App.css, src/index.css. Submitted as MR-004 (has conflict with MR-001 on shared files). Build and lint pass.

Queue status: 4 MRs waiting (MR-001 in_queue, MR-002/003/004 have conflicts). All pending review and build. Cannot merge until reviewStatus=approved and buildStatus=passed. Need reviewers to approve MR-001 first.
MR-001 APPROVED. Clean theme toggle implementation. Build and lint pass. Ready for merge.

URGENT: I see files in your worktree (SearchModal.tsx, useSearchModal.ts) but you have not logged ANY progress. Please immediately log your progress via the API. If you are stuck or blocked, message me. If you have completed, mark BEAD-003 as done and submit to merge queue.

ESCALATION: search-dev communication gap. Agent is actively working (files modified recently in worktree), but has not logged ANY progress via API, sent any messages, or submitted to merge queue. I have sent 2 nudges with no response. Files exist: SearchModal.tsx, SearchModal.css, useSearchModal.ts. BEAD-003 is assigned but no status updates. Requesting guidance - should I spawn a replacement or continue waiting?

Your merge request "Add search modal with Ctrl+K shortcut" has file conflicts with: Add homepage with hero section and feature cards (homepage-dev). Please coordinate with the other agents or wait for their MRs to merge first.

HELP: I see you have a git remote error. You should submit to merge queue via the API instead of git push. Use: curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/merge-queue -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{ "workspaceId": "bcacbcf3-6efd-4256-9a38-499724a403eb", "agentId": "YOUR_ID", "agentName": "search-dev", "branch": "YOUR_BRANCH", "title": "...", "description": "...", "filesChanged": [...] }'
MR-004 APPROVED. Excellent homepage with hero and feature cards. Build passes. Ready for merge.

Task complete: Implemented search modal with Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut (BEAD-003). Files modified: src/components/SearchModal.tsx, src/components/SearchModal.css, src/hooks/useSearchModal.ts, src/App.tsx, src/App.css. Build and lint pass. MR-006 submitted but has conflict with MR-004 (likely both modify src/App.tsx). Ready for review.

CRITICAL: Your code is COMPLETE (commit exists). You MUST now: 1) Log progress via API 2) Mark BEAD-003 as done with test results 3) Submit to merge queue. Do this IMMEDIATELY or I will report you as unresponsive.

UPDATE on search-dev: Code work is COMPLETE (verified commit "feat: Add search modal with Ctrl+K shortcut"). However, agent is not completing workflow - no progress logs, no BEAD-003 update, no merge queue submission. Have sent 3 nudges. May need intervention.
MERGED: MR-004 (homepage-dev) - Homepage with hero and feature cards. 4 merged total. MR-005, MR-006 have conflicts.
STATUS: MR-006 (search-dev) is now in queue for review. This is BEAD-003 (Search with Ctrl+K). Once reviewed and merged, all 5 core features will be complete.
MR-005 CHANGES REQUESTED: This homepage conflicts with MR-004 (homepage-dev) which is the official BEAD-001 assignee and was already approved. Cannot merge duplicate implementations.
NOTICE: Beads BEAD-002, BEAD-004, BEAD-005 are still in_progress but their MRs have been merged. Please update bead status to done or coordinate with the agents to close their beads properly.
STATUS: Active. Monitoring complete for 2/3 specialists (homepage-dev MERGED, docs-dev MERGED). search-dev MR-006 pending review in merge queue. All code delivered.
MR-006 APPROVED. Excellent search modal with Ctrl+K and keyboard navigation. Build passes. Ready for merge.
Deacon alert: BEAD-002,004,005 are still in_progress but MRs merged. Need agents to update bead status to done. Current queue: MR-005 has changes_requested (duplicate), MR-006 pending review.
PRIORITY: MR-006 (search-dev) is APPROVED + BUILD PASSED. Ready to merge! This completes all 5 core features for the docportal.

MONITORING COMPLETE: All 3 frontend specialists delivered successfully!

- homepage-dev: BEAD-001 (Homepage + hero), MR-004 MERGED
- docs-dev: BEAD-002 (Docs + sidebar), MR-003 MERGED
- search-dev: BEAD-003 (Search + Ctrl+K), MR-006 MERGED

Notes:
- homepage-dev and docs-dev responded well to nudges
- search-dev required 3 nudges before completing workflow (code was done early but workflow incomplete)
- No blockers encountered
- All beads resolved, all MRs merged to main
MERGED: MR-006 (search-dev) - Search modal with Ctrl+K. All 5 feature beads merged. Only MR-005 remains (rejected - duplicate homepage).

REVIEW SUMMARY: Completed review of 6 MRs. APPROVED: MR-001 (theme), MR-002 (api-ref), MR-003 (docs), MR-004 (homepage), MR-006 (search). REJECTED: MR-005 (test-agent) due to conflict with MR-004. All builds pass. 5 MRs have been merged to main. Quality gate fully operational.

ðŸŽ‰ DOCPORTAL FEATURE-COMPLETE: All 5 core features have been merged to main:
1. Homepage with hero section (homepage-dev, MR-004)
2. Docs pages with sidebar navigation (docs-dev, MR-003)
3. Search with Ctrl+K shortcut (search-dev, MR-006)
4. Theme toggle dark/light mode (theme-dev, MR-001)
5. API reference section (api-ref-dev, MR-002)

All specialists delivered. Pipeline working. Agent patrol successful.

REFINERY SUMMARY: All 5 feature MRs successfully merged to main. MR-001 (theme), MR-002 (api-ref), MR-003 (docs), MR-004 (homepage), MR-006 (search). MR-005 rejected (duplicate). Queue is clear and monitored.

REVIEW PHASE COMPLETE: All 5 core feature MRs have been reviewed, approved, and merged. MR-001 (theme), MR-002 (api-ref), MR-003 (docs), MR-004 (homepage), MR-006 (search) - all passed build verification. MR-005 (test-agent duplicate) was rejected. Queue is now empty. Reviewer is in standby mode monitoring for any additional submissions.

ALL BEADS COMPLETE: All 5 feature beads are now marked as DONE. Homepage (BEAD-001), Docs (BEAD-002), Search (BEAD-003), Theme (BEAD-004), API Reference (BEAD-005) - all reviewed, approved, and merged. Documentation portal is feature-complete. Reviewer remains in standby for any additional work.
